reference.title: cxxStructDerivationAccessSpecifier
reference.shortdesc: Indicates the access specifier used when a struct inherits from a base class, struct, or union.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxStructDerivationAccessSpecifier> element is contained within a <cxxStructDerivation> element. The valueattribute is set to “public”, “protected” or “private” to describe the access the struct has to the members of the base that is being derived from. The base referered to by the <cxxStructDerivationAccessSpecifier> element is indicated byeither a <cxxStructBaseStruct>, <cxxStructBaseStruct> or <cxxStructBaseUnion> element as a sibling of <cxxStructDerivationAccessSpecifier>.
